difficulty bearing weight and limping.
casting. conservative management.
non-displaced spiral fracture of the tibia.

soft tissue swelling of ankle, but no evident additional fracture.
toddler's fracture
toddler's fracture
4 year-old girl with pain after twisting leg while sliding down a slide at the playground.
